artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Folded sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,457); woman at left in a white gown with a blue and red striped overgown and a hat with pink roses and white feathers; woman at right in a white gown with a blue and red striped overgown with a yellow sash and white gloves with ruffled trim at the elbows
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Fashion plate from Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Second Cahier, 5 Mars 1790
